title.narrative: Vietnam Public Sector Linkages Program Round 1

description.narrative: - Under Strategy Objective Six of the (draft) Australia Vietnam Country Strategy 2008-15, developing long-term partnerships between Australian and Vietnamese public sector institutions is highlighted as one aspect of our support to help Vietnam identify and respond to the challenges associated with its transition to middle income status. - While Vietnam has not participated in the PSLP program for several years there is a strong and growing demand from GoV agencies to engage in direct cooperation with their Australian counterparts. PSLP provides a well established and appropriate mechanism for meeting this demand. - The activities proposed also align with the other Strategy Objectives of the (draft) Country Strategy, namely promoting economic integration (agriculture cooperation, aviation safety), responding to natural disasters and climate change (sustainable water use) and reform of the health system (nurse training).
